settings.title: DEMO UNIT
settings.content:
Headphone Zone Certified Demo Headphones

Our careful selection of demo headphones gives you the experience of pre-burned in headphones - at drop dead prices. We do this sale every year to clear up our existing demos and to make way for new units instead. These demo headphones have been used at our Experience Studio in Mumbai. The pictures above depict the condition of the product and also indicate the accessories available with the headphone. For any specific questions about the condition please get in touch with us! While the product itself is fully tested by our Headphone Gurus and the outer packaging may have suffered some damage.

Get The Best Deal

You may or may not get the original packaging or some accessories may be missing & because of the fact that they've been extensively used as a demo at the Experience Studio, we give a good discount compared to a new gear.

Unchanged Policies

Received a defective Demo unit? Return it under our 7 Day Replacement Guarantee Policy.
P.S. If you do not like your gear, unfortunately we will not be able to accept the return.

Pre-Burned In

Demo headphones save you the time of burning in new headphones. Typically, brand new headphones take up to weeks to fully break in and sound as good as they should. With demo headphones, you get to enjoy the best sound out of the box.

Unbiased Customer Service

We have the same Headphone Zone customer support experience for Demo Units or any products.

Consider It Vintage

Vintage products have a certain charm that cannot be put into words. Think of old, discontinued demo headphones as vintage. They have a story; they have, how-to-say, character.

Professionally Inspected

A thorough inspection means you receive a 100% working headphone with no sound output issues.

{%- style -%} .demo-description { display: grid; grid-template-columns: 1fr 3fr; padding-bottom: 5rem; text-align:left; } .demo-features { display: grid; grid-template-columns: repeat(3, 1fr); } .demo-features img { justify-self: center; } .demo-section { display: grid; grid-template-columns: 1fr 3fr; gap:0.9rem; padding-bottom:3rem; text-align:left; } @media screen and (max-width:800px) { .demo-description { grid-template-columns: 1fr; } .demo-features { grid-template-columns: repeat(2, 1fr); } } @media screen and (max-width:600px) { .demo-features { grid-template-columns: 1fr; } .demo-features img { justify-self: left; } } {%- endstyle -%}
